description: Patient presenting with chest pain symptoms - triggers chest-pain skill

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Good morning. What brings you in today?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I've been having this pain in my chest for the past couple of days.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Can you describe the pain for me?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: It's a pressure feeling, kind of tight. It started yesterday morning.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Does the pain go anywhere else, like your arm or jaw?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Sometimes I feel it in my left arm, especially when I'm walking upstairs.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Any shortness of breath or sweating with it?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Yes, I get a little short of breath and sometimes I sweat more than usual.
